The pim command enables PIM and displays the PIM view of the public network instance.
The undo pim command clears all configurations in the PIM view, releases resources occupied by PIM, and restores the initial state. The pim command enables PIM and displays the PIM view of the public network instance. The undo pim command clears all configurations in the PIM view, releases resources occupied by PIM, and restores the initial state. By default, PIM is not enabled.
ExtraInfo: PIM parameters can be configured only after PIM is enabled, and global PIM parameters can be configured only in the PIM view of the public network instance.
